name: Project Halberd
description:
Project Halberd

Welcome to Solus, outer rim of the core systems. Do battle against cutthroat outlaw raids as newly hired Pilot Zero and uncover the secrets of a newfound weapon shrouded in starlight.

Features
  • Story driven sci-fi cutscenes
  • Real time space combat
  • 9 missions across 3 regions
  • 5 enemy ship types
  • Atmospheric visuals
